footer.description: A platform for debugging, encoding, decoding & demonstrating your technical work.

empty.title: No tools found
empty.subtitle: No tools found matching your search criteria.

cta.title: Need a custom tool?
cta.desc: Can't find what you're looking for? MyDebugger is open source and continually evolving. Suggest new features, report bugs, or contribute directly to our GitHub repository.

qrcode.lede: Generate QR codes for any URL or deeplink. Auto-encode queries, preview safe links, and test instantly on your device.
qrcode.empty: Enter a URL or deeplink to generate QR code

meta.description: Test deep links instantly and generate beautiful, share-ready QR codes with gradients and logos. Works with custom schemes like myapp:// and https:// URLs.
meta.og: Create deep link QR codes, auto-encode safe URLs, and run links on devices. Built for modern teams.

howto.title: How to generate a QR code
howto.step1: Enter a URL or choose a type
howto.step2: Pick a style preset or colors
howto.step3: Download as PNG, SVG or PDF

jwt-toolkit.title: JWT Toolkit
jwt-toolkit.description: Comprehensive toolkit for JWT: decode, build, inspect, verify and benchmark tokens.

url-encoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
url-encoder.description: Encode or decode URL components safely.

headers-analyzer.title: HTTP Headers Analyzer
headers-analyzer.description: Analyze and understand HTTP request/response headers.

regex-tester.title: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with real-time matching.

qrcode-generator.title: Deep-Link Tester & QR Generator
qrcode-generator.description: Generate QR codes for any link or deeplink, test them directly and share with your team.

qrscan.title: QR Scanner
qrscan.description: Scan QR codes using your device camera.

clickjacking-validator.title: Click Jacking Validator
clickjacking-validator.description: Check if websites are vulnerable to click jacking attacks by analyzing headers and iframe loading.

device-trace.title: Dynamic-Link Probe
device-trace.description: Test how App Flyer/OneLink URLs behave across different device contexts and installation states.

dynamic-link-probe.title: Dynamic Link Tracker
dynamic-link-probe.description: Parse dynamic link parameters and display a debug overlay.

deep-link-chain.title: Deep Link Chain
deep-link-chain.description: Follow redirects and extract UTM parameters entirely in the browser.

cookie-inspector.title: Cookie Inspector
cookie-inspector.description: View cookies for this session and export them.

cache-inspector.title: Cache Inspector
cache-inspector.description: Inspect browser caching for loaded resources.

storage-sync-debugger.title: Storage Sync Debugger
storage-sync-debugger.description: Inspect localStorage and sessionStorage with live sync events.

virtual-card.title: Virtual Name Card
virtual-card.description: Generate and share a digital contact card with QR code and download.

cookie-scope.title: Cookie Scope
cookie-scope.description: Visualize document cookies and highlight duplicates.

crypto-lab.title: Crypto Lab
crypto-lab.description: Play with AES and RSA encryption, generate keys, and test algorithms.

pentest-suite.title: Pentest Validator Suite
pentest-suite.description: Run basic security checks like HTTPS enforcement and clickjacking detection.

header-scanner.title: Header Scanner
header-scanner.description: Scan security headers and get fix tips.

pre-rendering-tester.title: Pre-rendering & SEO Meta Tester
pre-rendering-tester.description: Test how Googlebot, Bingbot, Facebook, and real users see your web content — including title, description and H1 rendering.

fetch-render.title: Fetch & Render
fetch-render.description: Emulate JS rendering and capture DOM.

permission-tester.title: Web Permission Tester
permission-tester.description: Request, inspect, and test browser permissions with live previews and code snippets.

generate-large-image.title: Generate Large Image
generate-large-image.description: Create dummy images for upload testing.

api-simulator.title: API Simulator
api-simulator.description: Encode JSON to Base64 and test API responses.

api-test.title: API Request Repeater
api-test.description: Repeat HTTP requests from a curl command.

network-suit.title: Network Test Suite
network-suit.description: Check connection type, ping and download speed.

thong-thai.title: Thong Thai Flag Creator
thong-thai.description: Create, animate, and export the Thai national flag.

csv-to-markdown.title: CSV to Markdown
csv-to-markdown.description: Convert CSV tables to GitHub-flavored Markdown.

json-converter.title: JSON to CSV / Excel Converter
json-converter.description: Convert JSON data to CSV or Excel spreadsheets.
